{{Infobox sports season | title =2009â10 Basketball League of Serbia | league =[[Basketball League of Serbia]] | sport =[[Basketball]] | logo = | pixels = | caption = | duration = | attendance = | TV =[[Radio Television of Serbia|RTS]] | season =Super League | season_champs =[[KK Partizan|Partizan]] | MVP = | MVP_link = | top_scorer = | top_scorer_link = | playoffs = | playoffs_link = | conf1 = | conf1_link = | conf1_champ = | conf1-runner-up = | conf2 = | conf2_link = | conf2_champ = | conf2-runner-up = | finals = | finals_link = | finals_champ =[[KK Partizan|Partizan]] | finals_runner-up =[[KK Hemofarm|Hemofarm STADA]] | finals_MVP = | finals_MVP_link = | seasonslist = | seasonslistnames = Basketball League of Serbia | prevseason_link = 2008â09 Basketball League of Serbia | prevseason_year = 2008â09 | nextseason_link = 2010â11 Basketball League of Serbia | nextseason_year = 2010â11 }} The '''2009â10 Basketball League of Serbia season''' was the 4th season of the [[Basketball League of Serbia]], the highest professional [[basketball]] league in [[Serbia]].
